name: @contentauth/detector
description: Module to scan binary data for C2PA flags

scripts.dev: nodemon -x wasm-pack -e rs -w src -w -- build --dev --out-name detector --target web
scripts.build: wasm-pack --quiet build --out-name detector --release --target web && rm -f pkg/.gitignore pkg/package.json
scripts.build:verbose: wasm-pack --verbose build --out-name detector --release --target web && rm -f pkg/.gitignore pkg/package.json
